General.Name: Zhejiang Dehong Automotive
General.Description: Zhejiang Dehong Automotive Electronic & Electrical Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of automobile alternators in China. Its products are used in commercial vehicles and passenger cars, aftermarket products, and electronic vacuum pumps. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Huzhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. Guoqiang  Zhu
1.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
